install.name: Search - Google Search Appliance
install.author: Aaron Averett - Bureau of Economic Geology
install.copyright: 2011 Texas Bureau of Economic Geology, The University of Texas at Austin
install.description: Allows searching within collections on a Google Search Appliance or Google Mini.

param.name: gsa_address
param.label: GSA Full Hostname
param.description: The full host name for the Google Search Appliance.

param.name: frontend_name
param.label: GSA Frontend
param.description: The frontend on the GSA to be used for searching.

param.name: result_count
param.label: Max Result Size
param.description: This is the maximum size of the result set that will be returned from the GSA

param.name: search_source_name
param.description: This is shown as the source within the Joomla instance of the search results.

param.name: collection
param.label: Collection
param.description: This is the collection within the search appliance index that should be searched.

param.name: gsa_username
param.label: GSA Username
param.description: The username to use for secured Google Search Appliances

param.name: gsa_password
param.label: GSA Password
param.description: The password to use for secured Google Search Appliances
